reviewText: Love this dvd!  Love all of the dvds in this sign language series.  I hope so much that he comes out with more dvds.  We have learned a lot from them and they are very fun too!  Please keep these great dvds coming! Thank you.

What a great introduction to signing and a very enjoyable and entertaining educational lesson.  I would love to see more from Bob Hilterman.  His presentation is clear, easy to follow and alot of fun.
